mapper.select:
SELECT a.account,a.server,a.exchange_date,b.goods_code,b.goods_name,b.credits_cost FROM xuanwuba_goodsget_tb a left join xuanwuba_goodsinfo_tb b on a.goods_code = b.code WHERE 1 = 1
and account like CONCAT('%','${account}','%' )
and DATEDIFF( d ,#{strExchangeDate} ,[exchange_date])=0 and DATEDIFF( m ,#{strExchangeDate} ,[exchange_date])=0 and DATEDIFF( yyyy ,#{strExchangeDate} ,[exchange_date])=0
order by exchange_date desc
